title: Matrix Multiplication Visualizer
description: Step-by-step visualization of matrix multiplication showing row-by-column dot product calculations with animation and highlighting.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Linear Algebra
Matrices
Matrix Multiplication

learningObjectives: Explain the row-by-column dot product process for computing each entry
Determine the dimensions of the result matrix given input dimensions
Identify when two matrices can be multiplied
Calculate individual entries of a matrix product

controls.label: Matrix A Dimensions
controls.description: Set the dimensions of matrix A

controls.label: Matrix B Dimensions
controls.description: Set the dimensions of matrix B (rows must match columns of A)

controls.label: Next
controls.description: Advance to the next step of the calculation

controls.label: Auto
controls.description: Toggle auto-play mode to animate all calculations

controls.label: Reset
controls.description: Reset the animation to the beginning with new random values

controls.label: Speed
controls.description: Animation speed in milliseconds per step

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of matrix multiplication visualizer
Explore matrix multiplication visualizer through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of matrix multiplication visualizer to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on matrix multiplication visualizer
